results.title: Triple Therapy with Telmisartan, Amlodipine, and Rosuvastatin (TAR) Versus Telmisartan/Amlodipine (TA) and Telmisartan/Rosuvastatin (TR) Combinations in Hypertension and Dyslipidemia: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: AIM: This study investigated the comparative efficacy and safety of a three-drug regimen (TAR) containing @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ against two-drug combinations (@<m>CHEMICAL_telmisartan_amlodipine_combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:C548840 @@@TA@@@ and TR) for managing @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@dyslipidemia@@@.
